long_description: are you looking for children's 1:1 lamda speech & drama lessons. you've come to the right place. suitable for all ages and abilities. i'm savanna madden, the founder and principal of madden theatre arts. i have been teaching drama and musical theatre all over cambridgeshire, hertfordshire, and essex for many years now - over 15 years of teaching experience. madden theatre arts also offers 1:1 sessions for adults in acting, interview technique, confidence building, career coaching and presenting skills.

generated_description: madden theatre arts is a drama and theatre education company based in hitchin, england. founded in 2019 by savanna madden, the company offers a range of services including 1:1 drama and musical theatre coaching, lamda exam preparation, and public speaking workshops. madden theatre arts provides both online and in-person sessions, catering to students of all ages and abilities. the company also runs drama and musical theatre clubs in local primary schools and offers bespoke coaching for adults in acting, interview technique, confidence building, career coaching, and presenting skills.
